# `prov_match`

Check provenance info matches across list of S4 subobjects


## Description

Check provenance info matches across list of S4 subobjects


## Usage

```r
prov_match(..., verbose = FALSE)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`...`     |     list of s4 subobjects to match provenance
`verbose`     |     print discovered provenance info
